comments.body: Because `schema.fields` is a `Array` , support random access, so there was no change of `def this(schema: StructType) ` constructor.

comments.body: Let's also add a short comment. Using plan while is actually recommanded per the guide at https://github.com/databricks/scala-style-guide#traversal-and-zipwithindex so it's likely people attempt to use while here in the future
Heh we should probably update the style guide to note exactly this - that is only an 'optimization' if you have constant-time access to both sequences.
